name: Chonky Boi and the Sausage Land
name_original: Chonky Boi and the Sausage Land
description:
Welcome to the adventures of the Chonky Boi in the Sausage Land!

Chonky Boi - a sweet dog - roams through the Sausage Land and devours food he stumbles upon his way. There are three types of pickups but beware - you might lose points on some of them! The goal of the game is to get to the finish with the highest amount of points. 

Controls: arrows to move, space to jump

This is a prototype project I  game developed during Unity Hackweek 2020. I used Gimp for art assets and Audacity for sound recording.

Let me know what you think - I'd like to hear feedback on what can be improved and ideas that would make the game more interesting.
